basic.name: Spectral Scythe (Q)
basic.description: Summon a scythe that travels to Xul after 1 second, dealing 190 damage to enemies and spawning a Skeletal Warrior when hitting enemy Heroes.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.

basic.name: Cursed Strikes (W)
basic.description: Xul's Basic Attacks deal damage in a wide area and reduce the Attack Speed of Heroes and Summons by 40% for 2 seconds. Lasts 4 seconds once triggered.

basic.name: Bone Prison (E)
basic.description: After a 2 second delay, deal 80 damage and Root the target enemy Hero for 1.75 seconds.  All nearby Skeletal Warriors will fixate on the target for their duration.

basic.name: Bone Armor (?)
basic.description: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 25% of Xul's maximum Health for 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Poison Nova (R)
heroic.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 630 damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

heroic.name: Skeletal Mages (R)
heroic.description: Vector TargetingSummon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

trait.name: Raise Skeleton (T)
trait.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, it becomes a Skeletal Warrior with 240 Health that attacks for 21 damage and lasts up to 12 seconds. Upon death, Skeletal Warriors deal 40 damage to nearby enemies.  Up to 3 Skeletal Warriors can be active at once when spawned in this way.

1.name: Backlash
1.description: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.

1.name: Shackler
1.description: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.

1.name: Shade
1.description: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 10 seconds.

4.name: Reaper's Toll
4.description: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 2 seconds and its Mana cost by 15.

4.name: Grim Scythe
4.description: Increase Xul's Basic Attack damage by 15%.  Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 12 seconds.

4.name: Jailors
4.description: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors.Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 25% Movement and Attack Speed.

7.name: Harvest Vitality
7.description: Cursed Strikes heals for 70% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

7.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
7.description: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.5% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.2% of his maximum Mana.

7.name: Wall Of Bones
7.description: Increase the Shield amount of Bone Armor to 35% of Xul's maximum Health, and Xul gains 20 Spell Armor for its duration.

10.name: Poison Nova
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 630 damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

10.name: Skeletal Mages
10.description: Vector TargetingSummon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

13.name: Echoes of Death
13.description: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 40% damage.

13.name: Rapid Harvest
13.description: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.

13.name: Amplify Damage
13.description: Increase the Root duration of Bone Prison by 0.25 seconds.  Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 2 seconds.

16.name: Decrepify
16.description: Enemy Heroes that are damaged by Spectral Scythe or Skeletal Warriors are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Weaken
16.description: Enemy Heroes who are damaged by Cursed Strikes or Skeletal Warriors deal 35% less damage for 3 seconds.

16.name: Bone Spear
16.description: Deal 230 damage to enemies in a line.

20.name: Andariel's Visage
20.description: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt and its duration is increased by 50%.

20.name: Cold Hand of Death
20.description: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%.  Every 5th Spectral Scythe that hits enemy Heroes spawns a Frost Mage instead of a Skeletal Warrior at their location.

20.name: Mortal Wound
20.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

20.name: Kalan's Edict
20.description: Each time Skeletal Warriors deal damage, reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor and Xul's Heroic Ability by 1.5%.
